quizzes.question: The comparison operators return:

Please enter the corresponding operators according to the comments at right.
[!raw!]
val1 {0} val2 // are equal
val1 {1} val2 // not equal
val1 {2} val2 // less than
val1 {3} val2 // are strict equal (identical)
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Comparison Operators[/h1]

The table below explains the comparison operators. [img id="2748" width="100%"]
[note]When using operators, be sure that the arguments are of the same data type; numbers should be compared with numbers, strings with strings, and so on.[/note]
